examples.example: 大部分人都在为了自己的梦想而努力奋斗着。

translate.english: Most people are striving hard for their own dreams.

examples.example: 大部分同学都积极参加各种社会实践活动，提升自己的综合能力。

translate.english: Most students actively participate in various social practice activities to improve their comprehensive abilities.

examples.example: 大部分孩子都在快乐健康地成长。

translate.english: Most children are growing up happily and healthily.
